description: Single storey rear/side extension, part first floor rear extension, alteration of roof from hip to gable end, rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony and installation of three rooflights to the front roof slope.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: LR/ND/001: BLOCK PLAN; LR/ND/003: EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN; LR/ND/005: EXISTING FRONT & REAR ELEVATION; LR/ND/002: EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN; LR/ND/004: EXISTING ROOF PLAN; LR/ND/006: EXISTING SIDE ELEVATION; LR/ND/000: LOCATION PLAN; ND/LR/008: PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN; ND/LR/011 REV A: PROPOSED FRONT AND REAR ELEVATION; ND/LR/010 REV A: PROPOSED ROOF PLAN; ND/LR/009: PROPOSED LOFT FLOOR PLAN; ND/LR/012: PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATION
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved three (3) rooflights to the main front roof slope of shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
